import React, { useState } from 'react' import Chat from '../Components/Complain/Chat' import Contact from '../Components/Complain/Contact' import NavBar from '../Components/NavBar' import {io} from 'socket.io-client' let socket export default function UserComplain() { const title = 'Complain' document.title = 'DumbMerch | ' + title const [contact, setContact] = useState(null) const [contacts, setContacts] = useState([]) const dataContact = [ { id: 1, name: 'Admin', chat: 'Yes, Is there anything I can help', } ] return (
) }
